column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Visited Chicago for my first time and everyone told me that deep dish was a must try when visiting. When I looked through Yelp
column2: there were so many options to choose from
column3: but Lou Malnati's had the most reviews and I was around the area so I gave it a shot. The menu was simple
column5: I went with the original deep dish which consists of cheese
